title: Mobile Bridge
pwa_management_desc: Manage your Progressive Web App features and settings
app_installation_desc: Install the app on your device for quick access and native-like experience.
offline_support_desc: Continue working even without internet connection with automatic data sync.
push_notifications_desc: Stay updated with real-time notifications for important events and updates.
performance_desc: Optimized performance with caching and background sync capabilities.
pwa_features_desc: Progressive Web App capabilities that enhance your user experience
pwa_dashboard_desc: Monitor your PWA performance and usage
pwa_dashboard_content: PWA dashboard content will be implemented here.
notification_settings_content: Notification settings will be implemented here.
offline_synchronization_desc: Manage offline data and synchronization settings
offline_sync_content: Offline sync will be implemented here.
app_installation_page_desc: Install the app on your device for the best experience
install_prompt_info: The install prompt will appear automatically when available, or you can trigger it manually from the PWA Dashboard.
